coverage_details.bone_marrow_transplant: Not Covered (but up to 3 cases covered in special instructions)
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Heart, liver, kidney covered. Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
coverage_details.congenital: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (special sub-limit SR 150,000 for congenital/deformities as below)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for outpatient & inpatient, except for out-patient services with limits; dental, hearing aids, maternity, optical, dialysis require pre-auth.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Congenital diseases/deformities are covered for all beneficiaries subject to policy aggregate limit SR 150,000. Developmental Cases covered. Up to 3 bone marrow transplant cases max. Illness due to allergy covered. Insulin pump (below 8 years/above 60 with Alzheimer/memory disorder). Parents/Collaterals up to 200 covered. 5 post-IVF cases covered per policy period. Single/Private Room at IMC & Dr. Suleiman Habib for VVIP. In-house clinic costs up to SR 500,000 covered. Knee replacement after trauma covered. Dental scaling & pulpotomy covered. If not available from appropriate provider, Bupa will arrange alternative. Dental: consult, extractions, RCT, fillings, x-rays, antibiotics, meds up to sub-limit. Disability cases covered per CCHI. RTA injuries covered. Newborns automatically covered. Congenital/birth defects for newborns up to policy max. Ear piercing for newborn baby girls up to SR 300. Optical benefit, age restrictions waived. Psoriasis covered. Isolation treatment covered. Organ transplant benefit covers heart/liver/kidney; medication limited to pre-auth approval.

coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Pre-Authorization for VIP scheme: SR 2,000. No pre-approval for outpatient & inpatient, except for out-patient services with limits; dental, hearing aids, maternity, optical, dialysis require pre-auth.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Congenital diseases/deformities covered up to aggregate SR 150,000. Developmental Cases covered. Up to 3 bone marrow transplant cases max. Allergy treatment covered. Insulin pump (below 8 years/above 60 with Alzheimer/memory disorder). Parents/Collaterals up to 200 covered. 5 post-IVF cases covered per policy period. Single/Private Room at IMC & Dr. Suleiman Habib for VVIP. In-house clinic costs up to SR 500,000 covered. Knee replacement after trauma covered. Dental scaling & pulpotomy covered. If not available from appropriate provider, Bupa will arrange alternative. Dental: consult, extractions, RCT, fillings, x-rays, antibiotics, meds up to sub-limit. Disability cases covered per CCHI. RTA injuries covered. Newborns automatically covered. Congenital/birth defects for newborns up to policy max. Ear piercing SR 300 newborns. Optical age limit waived. Psoriasis & hospital isolation covered. Organ transplant covers heart/liver/kidney; medication limited to pre-auth.
